basic.description: Vector spaces, linear transformations and matrices. Linear equations. Determinants. Eigenvalues and eigenvectors. Normal forms. Linear functions and dual spaces. Bilinear functions, quadratic and hermitian forms. Inner product spaces, the projection theorem and applications to approximation and optimization problems.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Linear Algebra

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: MTHE 217 or MATH 217 and registered in BSCE.
